name: Secret Invasion
desc: Nick Fury learns of a secret invasion of Earth by a faction of shapeshifting Skrulls; Fury joins his allies, and together they race against time to thwart an imminent Skrull invasion and save humanity.

name: Ant Man
desc: Scott, a master thief, gains the ability to shrink in scale with the help of a futuristic suit. Now he must rise to the occasion of his superhero status and protect his secret from unsavoury elements.

name: Moon Knight
desc: Steven Grant and mercenary Marc Spector investigate the mysteries of the Egyptian gods from inside the same body.

name: The Avengers
desc: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
